mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_nft ( nft_metadata_id, member_id, token_id, wallet_address, barcode, due_at, issued_reason, tx_hash, issued_at ) VALUES ( #{nftMetadata.id}, #{member.id}, #{tokenId}, #{walletAddress}, #{barcode}, #{dueAt}, #{issuedReason}, #{txHash}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_nft SET nft_metadata_id = #{nftMetadata.id}, member_id = #{member.id}, wallet_address = #{walletAddress}, barcode = #{barcode}, due_at = #{dueAt}, issued_reason = #{issuedReason}, tx_hash = #{txHash} WHERE id = #{id}
